Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Interface View

All Known Implementing Classes:
Cli, Gui, NetworkLayerView
public interface View
Generic view interface. It can be extended to provide different types of view (CLI, GUI, virtual network view...)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void askAction​(TurnState state)
    Asks the user which action he wants to do in the game, depending if the game is in the setup state or not.
    boolean askActiveLeader()
    Asks the server to activate a LeaderCard.
    void askFirstAction()
    Asks the user to perform the first setup action (choose 2 LeaderCards to discard).
    boolean askFoldLeader()
    Asks the server discard a LeaderCard.
    boolean askGetMarket()
    Initiates a market request action.
    boolean askGetProduction()
    Asks the server to buy a production card.
    void askPlayersNumber()
    Asks how many players you want in a game.
    void askPlayersNumber​(int number)
    Used to create a game of a known size.
    void askSecondAction()
    Asks the user to perform the second setup action (choose initial resources, where applicable).
    boolean askSortingMarket()
    Moves a resource from the temporary storage to the warehouse.
    void askSwitchRows()
    Asks the server to swap rows in the warehouse.
    boolean askUseBaseProduction()
    Asks the server to use the base production (the common PlayerBoard one).
    boolean askUseNormalProduction()
    Asks the server to use the normal production (the common DevelopmentCard-enabled one).
    void askUsername()
    Asks the user to choose a Username.
    boolean askUseSpecialProduction()
    Asks the server to use the special production (the LeaderCard-enabled one).
    ClientManager getClientManager()
    Returns the current ClientManager
    void joinLobby()
    Asks the server to join a lobby.
    void setNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
    Sets the local nickname parameter
    void showCommunication​(java.lang.String communication, CommunicationMessage type)
    Shows a generic communication message.
    void showDecks​(Decks decks)
    Shows and stores the DevelopmentCard decks.
    void showError​(java.lang.String error)
    Shows a generic error message.
    void showFaithPath​(FaithPath faithPath)
    Shows the new FaithPath after it has updated.
    void showLobby​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> players)
    Shows the lobby status.
    void showLoginResult​(boolean nick, boolean accepted, java.lang.String name)
    Shows the login message
    void showMarket​(Market market)
    Shows the Market after it has updated.
    void showPlayerBoard​(CompressedPlayerBoard playerBoard)
    Shows the PlayerBoard and saves it.

  • Method Details

    • askUsername

      void askUsername()
      Asks the user to choose a Username.

    • setNickname

      void setNickname​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Sets the local nickname parameter
      Parameters:
      nickname - The nickname you want to set.

    • askPlayersNumber

      void askPlayersNumber()
      Asks how many players you want in a game.

    • askPlayersNumber

      void askPlayersNumber​(int number)
      Used to create a game of a known size.
      Parameters:
      number - The size of the game to create.

    • joinLobby

      void joinLobby()
      Asks the server to join a lobby.

    • askAction

      void askAction​(TurnState state)
      Asks the user which action he wants to do in the game, depending if the game is in the setup state or not.
      Parameters:
      state - The current turn state

    • askFirstAction

      void askFirstAction()
      Asks the user to perform the first setup action (choose 2 LeaderCards to discard).

    • askSecondAction

      void askSecondAction()
      Asks the user to perform the second setup action (choose initial resources, where applicable).

    • askGetMarket

      boolean askGetMarket()
      Initiates a market request action.
      Returns:
      false if the user cancels the action, true otherwise.

    • askSortingMarket

      boolean askSortingMarket()
      Moves a resource from the temporary storage to the warehouse.
      Returns:
      false if the user cancels the action, true otherwise.

    • askSwitchRows

      void askSwitchRows()
      Asks the server to swap rows in the warehouse.

    • askGetProduction

      boolean askGetProduction()
      Asks the server to buy a production card.
      Returns:
      false if the user cancels the action, true otherwise.

    • askUseBaseProduction

      boolean askUseBaseProduction()
      Asks the server to use the base production (the common PlayerBoard one).
      Returns:
      false if the user cancels the action, true otherwise.

    • askUseSpecialProduction

      boolean askUseSpecialProduction()
      Asks the server to use the special production (the LeaderCard-enabled one).
      Returns:
      false if the user cancels the action, true otherwise.

    • askUseNormalProduction

      boolean askUseNormalProduction()
      Asks the server to use the normal production (the common DevelopmentCard-enabled one).
      Returns:
      false if the user cancels the action, true otherwise.

    • askFoldLeader

      boolean askFoldLeader()
      Asks the server discard a LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      false if the user cancels the action, true otherwise.

    • askActiveLeader

      boolean askActiveLeader()
      Asks the server to activate a LeaderCard.
      Returns:
      false if the user cancels the action, true otherwise.

    • showPlayerBoard

      void showPlayerBoard​(CompressedPlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Shows the PlayerBoard and saves it. It also saves other players' boards.
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - The board to save and/or show.

    • showFaithPath

      void showFaithPath​(FaithPath faithPath)
      Shows the new FaithPath after it has updated.
      Parameters:
      faithPath - The new Faith Path received from the server.

    • showDecks

      void showDecks​(Decks decks)
      Shows and stores the DevelopmentCard decks.
      Parameters:
      decks - The new decks received from the server.

    • showMarket

      void showMarket​(Market market)
      Shows the Market after it has updated.
      Parameters:
      market - The new Market received from the server.

    • showLoginResult

      void showLoginResult​(boolean nick, boolean accepted, java.lang.String name)
      Shows the login message
      Parameters:
      nick - true if the nickname is valid and not in use, false otherwise.
      accepted - true if the lobby is not already full, false otherwise.
      name - Nickname for the user

    • showLobby

      void showLobby​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> players)
      Shows the lobby status.
      Parameters:
      players - All players currently in the lobby.

    • showError

      void showError​(java.lang.String error)
      Shows a generic error message.
      Parameters:
      error - The message to show.

    • showCommunication

      void showCommunication​(java.lang.String communication, CommunicationMessage type)
      Shows a generic communication message.
      Parameters:
      communication - The message itself.
      type - The type of communication.

    • getClientManager

      ClientManager getClientManager()
      Returns the current ClientManager
      Returns:
      The active controller.
